H0.text: What is the favourite drink of a vampire. Type O Negative Cocktail

H1.text: What is the favourite drink of a vampire. Crimson Punch

H2.text: What is the favourite drink of a vampire. Midnight Eclipse

H3.text: What is the favourite drink of a vampire. Bloed

A4.text: Vampires are mythical creatures that drink blood directly for sustenance, usually with a preference for human blood.

A5.text: Blood drinking and similar activities were attributed to demons or spirits who would eat flesh and drink blood; even the devil was considered synonymous with the vampire.

A6.text: In Saxon regions of Germany, a lemon was placed in the mouth of suspected vampires.
